content: Aerator adapter Cast-in accessory to allow the installation of a single-stack waste pipe aerator system ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection ### FEATURES:Features Create an underside void in your slab Reduces final ceiling height by creating a recess up to 4 1/2 in your slab The aerator adapter is your solution to connect aerator fittings to drain, waste or vent (DWV) piping Allows for vertical, horizontal and oblique movement and thus simplifies plumbing installations Applications Connecting aerator fittings to drain, waste and vent (DWV) piping Creating an underside void for the installation of a single-stack waste pipe aerator system For use in conjunction with the appropriate cast-in device ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 244264 - Cast-in device aerator adapter 3 - Package Size 1 pc - 244265 - Cast-in device aerator adapter 4 - Package Size 1 pc
